name: Ribbiting Gameplay
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 106: Frogs²!

This game features a frog named Frog McAmphibianpants, trying to the best of his ability to travel through a poorly-procedurally generated swamp area.

Controls:

  Jump: hold space
  Shoot: left click
  Walk: A/D

No sound yet, and the options menu isn't functional lol

Credit to https://twitter.com/belowaveragemem for ideas and most of the art assets!

Web version is broken for the time being, but the downloadable versions should be fine!
